thread.title: Coming Distractions: New Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2 teaser welcomes you to the “fricken” team
thread.title_full: Coming Distractions: New Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2 teaser welcomes you to the “fricken” team

author: Sam Barsanti
title: Coming Distractions: New Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2 teaser welcomes you to the “fricken” team
text:
Share Tweet 
With the Big Game just about to kick off (literally, that’s how football games start), Marvel has jumped ahead of the crowd and released a new Guardians   teaser that’s almost entirely new footage. It’s only a minute long, but we get to see more of Mantis interacting with the Guardians, baby Groot welcoming Yondu to the “fricken” team, Gamora carrying the biggest gun ever, and a very funny Drax gag at the end. (Not to mention Nebula apparently joining the good guys and a very golden woman who seems to be underestimating what Star-Lord and his ragtag group of assholes are capable of.) 
Guardians     5, 2017.
